data.name: Soul Wargame
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT US

Hello everyone, we are from Hardcore Studio. This is the second game of us. We are really glad to meet you on Steam again. As a small team of Wargame fans, we hope to stick to the hard-core strategy game. Because of the limited budget, we have to use some art materials from the first game. But we will try our best on it. Really hope you will like this game.


About the Game

INTRODUCE

Soul Wargame is a hard-core strategy game that combines Wargame and Roguelike. We built Multiple Roles and Rich Random Equip and Skill Attribution system which make the game derive a variety of strategies and tactics. In the meantime, we spent a lot of time on the design of level difficulties, and we hope to create a brand-new experience of “Soul” wargame. In this world that believes in the law of the jungle, even as the supreme commander, you must be cautious to make every single decision, because it will directly affect the fate of yourself and your enemies. Our goal is still to create the most fun wargame. I hope you will like this game.

FEATURES

  • The Hard-core Wargame
    This is a very hard-core strategy wargame. In order to defeat the powerful enemies, you must fully understand every Role and each Equip and Skill Attribution, and even sometimes have to make strategic decisions to abandon a character for protecting yourself. Are you really ready for accepting the challenge?
  • All Kinds of Changes
    The biggest fun of Roguelike is the unknown, also the most difficulty of strategic is how to deal with the unknown. A variety of Roles, Equips and Skills make a new experience in every time you enter the world. Choose your favorite way to play and challenge the infinite possibilities.
  • Multiple Roles
    All the roles have their own way to grow up and unique strategic value, also the enhancement of skills can specialize the role in different growth directions. In order to defeat the powerful enemies, you must have a team which is adaptable and suitable for your fighting style.
  • Balance Difficulty
    Every time you back from the world, you will get some rewards including coins or equipments. You can make yourself stronger with those rewards and unlock more characters, skills, also more powerful equipments. There is no way to become stronger in an instant. You have to fight!

data.short_description: This is a dark style strategy game that combines Wargame and Rogulike. Everyone received a mysterious invitation after destroying the conspiracy of the cult. You will lead a group of undead warriors on an adventure journey to defeat invincible enemies one by one.
